item.description: Football boots, called cleats or soccer shoes in North America, are an item of footwear worn when playing football.
item.name: Football boots

item.description: A backboard is a piece of basketball equipment. It is a raised vertical board with an attached basket consisting of a net suspended from a hoop.
item.name: Backboard

item.description: An ice hockey stick is a piece of equipment used in ice hockey to shoot, pass, and carry the puck across the ice.
item.name: Ice hockey stick

item.description: Ice skates are boots with blades attached to the bottom, used to propel the bearer across a sheet of ice while ice skating.
item.name: Ice skate

item.description: MMA gloves or grappling gloves are small, open-fingered gloves used in mixed martial arts bouts.
item.name: MMA gloves

item.description: A longboard is a type of sports equipment similar to, but not the same as, a skateboard.
item.name: Longboard

item.description: A racket or racquet is a sports implement consisting of a handled frame with an open hoop across which a network of strings or catgut is stretched tightly.
item.name: Racket
